input.sentences: the man was making a spicy soup . he cooked the meat first .
he added the vegetables to the pot .
he cooked the vegetables as well as the meat .
once it was done he had a spicy soup .
output.sentences: Aunt May's famous spicy soup requires two pounds of fresh meat.
We watched Aunt May turn on the burner to heat the vegetables that would be added to the soup pot later.
She cooked the vegetables, while the meat cooked in a separate pan.
She also made noodles that are an essential component of her soup.
Once all the ingredients of her famous spicy soup were in the same pot and the spice was added the kitchen was thoroughly fagrant with the delicious smell.
